summary: Ever wanted to look like one of the most beautiful women followers in Skyrim? Well, here you go.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to look like one of the most beautiful women followers in Skyrim? Well, here you go. This won't mess with anything, it's just a simple download. You HAVE TO HAVE racemenu, or else you won't get anywhere but just be yourself and a useless file.

Steps to install:
1. Manually download.
2. Grab the file and place it somewhere you can remember.
3. Go toÂ C:\Users\(Whatever your name is)\Desktop\Folders\ModOrganizer\overwrite\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets.
4. Grab the file and place it in there.
5. Load up skyrim.
6. In console (`), type in showracemenu.
7. Click on 'presets' option.
8. Press 'f9' and click on the file name.
9. Presto!

Now, the hair isn't going to be the same as the original mod, but you can edit the hair anyways. Also, her skin tone isn't the same, but you can also change her skin tone anyways, so be happy.
author: Your Boy
